about_the_game:
• Interact using your tools to investigate the evidence.

  • Interview select characters to gather crucial information.

  • Consult your trusty fae encyclopedia to uncover secrets of the faerie world.

  • Genderless protagonist with a customizable name.

  • Choose between rekindling your past romance with the detective (M), indulging in the mature charm of your patron (M), nurturing a gothic romance with the assistant (F), straying your childhood friend (F) into an intoxicating love, or simply being contented with yourself.

  • Various different endings and epilogues shaped by the choices you made.

You are a renowned faeologist in 1920s New York who has been tasked with solving a chilling crime:

"Bizarre murders happening across the upper echelons of New York society, with the mystery deepening with every clue."

Follow the clues with your fae expertise and keen investigative tools such as a magnifying glass and a blacklight, and gather vital information by interviewing those who hold fragments of the truth, all while navigating your allegiance between a relentless detective and your enigmatic patron.

Will you unravel the truth and cement the importance of faeology in a world that relegates it to the realm of pseudoscience?

name: Death & Faeology

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit and Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2GHZ or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX10, DX11, DX12 compatible

short_description: In a world where the fae-touched fall prey to a sinister killer, only a faeologist can uncover the truth. A dark academia murder mystery narrative game inspired by Strange Horticulture and the Ace Attorney series.
